document.full_text: the maricopa county sheriff's office inappropriately spent $99 million to pay for other law enforcement operations, including immigration patrols, county budget officials said.
document.title: southwest: arizona: county says its sheriff spent $99 million inappropriately
lines_and_colors: the maricopa county sheriff's office inappropriately spent $99 million to pay for other law enforcement operations, including immigration patrols, county budget officials said.
